```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(googlesheets)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r table1}
tibble(
  Variable = c(
    "date",
    "latitude",
    "longitude",
    "sample_type",
    "sample_source",
    "depth_m",
    "snow_thickness",
    "mission",
    "pi"
  ),
  Description = c(
    "Sampling date (UTC)",
    "Latitude of the sampling location (degree decimals).",
    "Longitude of the sampling location (degree decimals).",
    'Origin of the water ("water", "ice", "meltpond").',
    'Source of the water ("niskin", "underice" "0-1 cm", "0-3 cm", "3-10 cm", "rosette" ).',
    "Depth at which measurement was made.",
    'Qualitative value discribing the snow cover under which measurement was made ("thin_snow", "thick_snow").',
    'Misson identifier ("ice_camp_2015", "ice_camp_2016")',
    "Name(s) of the principal investigator(s) responsible of the measured variable."
  )) %>%
  kable("latex", longtable = TRUE, booktabs = TRUE, caption = "Descriptions of the minimal variables included in each dataset (i.e. in each CSV file).") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header"), font_size = 10)

```



```{r table2}
df <- gs_title("table2") %>%
  gs_read(ws = "parameters") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  arrange(year, parameter) %>%
  select(Year = year, Parameter = parameter, `Sampling method` = sampling, `Principal investigators` = p_i, Processed = r_script) %>% 
  mutate(Processed = case_when(
    Processed == "NODATA" ~ "Data not available yet",
    TRUE ~ "Available"
  ))

kable(df, "latex", longtable = TRUE, booktabs = TRUE, caption = "Parameters measured during the Green Edge ice camp surveys.") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header"), font_size = 10) %>%
  # row_spec(c(0), bold = TRUE) %>%
  landscape()
```
